description: This file defines a custom implementation of Feign's ErrorDecoder to handle different HTTP error responses by mapping them to specific exceptions or logging messages.

classes.name: CustomFeignErrorDecoder
classes.description: A custom Feign ErrorDecoder that maps HTTP error responses to specific exceptions or logs errors.

methods.name: decode
methods.description: Decodes the feign Response based on status code, returning appropriate exceptions or errors.

methods.name: extractBankingCoreGlobalException
methods.description: Extracts and deserializes a SimpleBankingGlobalException from the response body.
